definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: If this product blackening a bit, do not affect usage effect.
sentences.chinese: 本产品若略微变黑，不影响使用效果。

sentences.english: As the scientists' models predicted, the cages quickly grew darker over time.
sentences.chinese: 如科学家模型预测的那样，笼子会随时间迅速变黑。

sentences.english: The drop of ink diffused in the bowl of water, which became Black.
sentences.chinese: 这滴墨水在水里扩散，使整碗水变黑了。

sentences.english: How do you prevent loofah from turning black?
sentences.chinese: 丝瓜要如何烹调较不易变黑？

sentences.english: My head was swollen and my skin blackened.
sentences.chinese: Heidi说‘我整个头肿起来，皮肤也变黑了。’

sentences.english: It does so when the moon hides it.
sentences.chinese: 答案是当月亮遮挡了它时就会变黑。

sentences.english: The jowar stalks collapsed into the mud and the grain turned black.
sentences.chinese: 高粱杆子倒在泥地里，穗粒儿变黑了。

sentences.english: Frozen oil quality color black or impurity, criterion appropriate immediately change new.
sentences.chinese: 冷冻油的油质颜色变黑或有杂质，则宜立即换新。

sentences.english: Lawyers and painters can soon change white to black.
sentences.chinese: 律师和画家能很快使白变黑。

sentences.english: Melanin darkens the skin and is the cause of suntan.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素使皮肤变黑是人被晒黑的原因。

sentences.english: There were vines creeping across the blackened gravestones, slowly pulling them back to the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄藤缠绕变黑的碑石，慢慢将它们拖入热带丛林。

sentences.english: The visible symptom of black tip disorder was the darkening at the fruit stylar end.
sentences.chinese: 黑顶病的外观症状表现为果顶区域变黑。

sentences.english: The mountain stream changed has been black, no longer was before that clear enough to see bottom rill.
sentences.chinese: 溪水变黑了，已不再是以前那条清澈见底的小溪了。

sentences.english: The wall-ring was blackened and twisted like a burnt bannock.
sentences.chinese: 墙上的铁环象烤焦的薄饼，变黑了，扭曲变形。

sentences.english: Then abruptly the sediment turned black.
sentences.chinese: 后面的沉淀物突然变黑。

sentences.english: You need to grill the tomatoes until the skins blacken.
sentences.chinese: 你得把番茄烤到皮变黑为止。

definition: dark spot or blotch on the skin
to lose color/to fade/also pr. [diao4 shai3]
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
variant of 褪色[tui4 se4]/also pr. [tui4 shai3]
to turn pale/to lose color/to go white
